creditline: Bequest of Mr. and Mrs. Northrop Dawson, Jr.
description: stylized standing girl with very long hair down to her feet, covering her whole body except one shoulder and her hands, which are at her sides and upraised; two brown woodpeckers with white beaks and red heads on girl's arms; black ground; received framed
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
signed: bottom center in pencil: Kaoru Kawano
title: Woodpecker
